constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 17 (Thursday, January 28, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CALVERT:
H.R. 517.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This legislation is provided by Article I, Section 8 of the
United States Constitution, specifically clause 18 (relating
to the power to make all laws necessary and proper for
carrying out the powers vested in Congress)
[Page H250]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

title: Employee Bonus Protection Act
